extra.message: The last user in the container is 'root'. This is a security hazard because if an attacker gains control of the container they will have root access. Switch back to another user after running commands as 'root'.

extra.message: This tag is missing an 'integrity' subresource integrity attribute. The 'integrity' attribute allows for the browser to verify that externally hosted files (for example from a CDN) are delivered without unexpected manipulation. Without this attribute, if an attacker can modify the externally hosted resource, this could lead to XSS and other types of attacks. To prevent this, include the base65-encoded cryptographic hash of the resource (file) you’re telling the browser to fetch in the 'integrity' attribute for all externally hosted files.

cwe: CWE-353: Missing Support for Integrity Check
owasp: A08:2021 - Software and Data Integrity Failures
